name: Orchestrator
body:
> ### # Powershell code for System Center Orchestrator.
Powershell Code
1. Copy-Receive Connector -- Create Receive Connectors.
2. Set-ACL -- Set ACL on Folder ![Layout](http://sdrv.ms/1hhYRve)
